Texto: 
tenderness over lower abdomen
patient had this area removed and did well
free technetium pertecnatate scan demonstrates a focal area of activity in the lower abdomen; the intensity of activity follows gastric mucosa.
meckel diverticulum
meckel's diverticulum
urinary bladder diverticulum
focal gi bleed
aneurysm
abdominal pain; blood in stool
